name: 100! Block Puzzle Tentris
description:
A new provocation for block puzzle lovers! Let’s play 100 Puzzle Tentris!
The objective of Tentris is to last as long as possible before the 10x10 board fills up with blocks. Try to score 10,000 if you can!

• Pleasant and straightforward gameplay that you can experience anywhere, anytime.
• Distinctive themes to shape your experience even more exciting.

The puzzle is assured to satisfy your mind and think like never before. It is a magnificent way to balance between recreation and hurdles.
Can you beat your top score and the scores of your friends?

~ The 100 Puzzle Tentris Team ~
